summary: An Ordinance providing for the issuance of refunding bonds of The City of Seattle for the purpose of refunding and paying bonds of the former City of Ballard, now part of said City of Seattle, which will mature December 1, 1915, known as "Ballard Funding Bonds, 1895", in the sum of Twenty-four Thousand, Five Hundred ($24,500.) Dollars, and providing for the issuance and sale thereof and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
